desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.zh_tw: 日步美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的對策委員會一行人面前。對策委員會趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日富美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 日步美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。

desc.en: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.jp: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.

desc.ko: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.zh_tw: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的對策委員會一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的亞瑠和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助對策委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的对策委员会一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的阿露和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助对策委员会。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is in front of the building's gate but found enemies are under fire. Hifumi, at this point, connects onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stresses these howitzer have nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force begins to break through the lines.

desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會众人来到建筑门口，遭到敌人阻拦。日步美此时接入通讯，向各位表示了情况，并着重提到这些榴弹炮与三一毫无关联。通讯结束后，對策委員會几人开始突破。

desc.en: Everyone comes to the middle of the desert and recognizes the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduces the situation here and mentions about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director says they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 come out and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrust the combat to Problem Solver 68 and then look for Hoshino themselves.

desc.zh_tw: 众人来到了沙漠中央，认出了曾经阿拜多斯学校的踪迹。理事向各位简单介绍了这里的情况，并提到了黑服所称的“实验室”，就在另一边的建筑里。但理事表示必须先过了他这一关，就在这时便利屋68全员赶到，开始支援。對策委員會将应战责任委托给便利屋众人，自己则前往寻找星野。

desc.en: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.

desc.en: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system with EMP for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to hack in.

desc.zh_tw: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，響提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时貝里塔斯即可开始骇入。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka was too late to realize the trap set by Aris. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they still met other Seminar members.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井和綠到达了电梯前，与此同时朱音等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时優香才意识到愛麗絲的问题，而桃井、綠与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿到达了电梯前，与此同时茜等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时优香才意识到爱丽丝的问题，而桃井、绿与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃和绿到达了电梯前，与此同时茜等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时优香才意识到爱丽丝的问题，而桃、绿与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人在詠葉部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人在歌原部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人在咏叶部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人在歌原部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。

desc.en: When Momoi thought they were away from the threats, a single sniping bullet fired towards them. Midori realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Momoi and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.jp: When Momoi thought they were away from the threats, a single sniping bullet fired towards them. Midori realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Momoi and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.thai: When Momoi thought they were away from the threats, a single sniping bullet fired towards them. Midori realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Momoi and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.ko: When Momoi thought they were away from the threats, a single sniping bullet fired towards them. Midori realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Momoi and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.zh_tw: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，綠立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程師部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。

desc.en: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，遊戲開發部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，游戏开发部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。

desc.en: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.jp: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.thai: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.ko: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.zh_tw: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长寧瑠。寧瑠说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对愛麗絲提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长尼禄。尼禄说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长宁瑠。宁瑠说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长妮露。妮露说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。

desc.en: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flooding in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by a few bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.jp: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flooding in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by a few bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.

desc.ko: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flooding in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by a few bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。

desc.en: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a fight. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer get pursued. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light.
desc.jp: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a fight. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer get pursued. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light.

desc.ko: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a fight. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer get pursued. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠前来挑战开发部众人。寧瑠先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向愛麗絲发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。寧瑠还没反应过来，愛麗絲就抢先发射了光之剑。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄前来挑战开发部众人。尼禄先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。尼禄还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露前来挑战开发部众人。妮露先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。妮露还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.

desc.ko: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部和老师正在苦思要加入游戏新作的创意。桃井和綠的意见发生分歧，两人为了做出最后的结论，于是决定使用遊戲開發部代代相传的方式决胜负。另一方面，柚子为了让愛麗絲能获得特别的灵感，于是给了她任务。苦思该如何运行任务的愛麗絲决定先和老师一起去学园冒险。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部和老师正在苦思要加入游戏新作的创意。桃井和绿的意见发生分歧，两人为了做出最后的结论，于是决定使用游戏开发部代代相传的方式决胜负。另一方面，柚子为了让爱丽丝能获得特别的灵感，于是给了她任务。苦思该如何运行任务的爱丽丝决定先和老师一起去学园冒险。

desc.en: The Game Development Department started discussing about the game. From the mechanics of the dungeon, to the weapon and arsenal, as well as the art and manifestations. Midori was in great dissatisfaction due to how much emphasis did Momoi put on art. And with the fact that she often changed ideas, many art resources were discarded too. The twins forced Sensei to make a decision.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部众人开始讨论游戏的具体形式。从地牢的机制到武器装备，以及美术和表现形式之类。因为桃井过于强调美术而又常常易稿，许多美术资源都被废弃，引来妹妹綠的非常不满。两人强迫老师做出一个选择。

desc.en: Aris and Sensei came to the campus. Aris said that both she and Sensei were "Beginner Heros", due to a small argument in which Momoi tries to put BOSSes right at the beginning of the game and was rejected. Aris wondered how to complete Yuzu's missions, and Sensei advised Aris to just go forward to see if anything happens.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲与老师来到了千年校园。愛麗絲说自己和老师都是“见习勇者”，而这源于桃井试图在新手村外放BOSS而被否决一事。愛麗絲对如何进行柚子的任务很苦恼，而老师则建议愛麗絲先前进再说。

desc.en: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.jp: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.

desc.ko: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.zh_tw: 季原以为寧瑠会独自去拯救愛麗絲，包含寧瑠在内的所有C&C成员都开始和季交战。遊戲開發部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时原以为尼禄会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含尼禄在内的所有C&C成员都开始和时交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季原以为宁瑠会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含宁瑠在内的所有C&C成员都开始和季交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时原以为妮露会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含妮露在内的所有C&C成员都开始和时交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。

desc.en: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.jp: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.thai: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.ko: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.zh_tw: 季表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，季傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为寧瑠会随老师一起；但这并非事实。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，时傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为尼禄会随老师一起；但这并非事实。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 时表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，时傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为妮露会随老师一起；但这并非事实。

desc.en: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.thai: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.ko: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_tw: C&C强大的夹攻成功让季处于劣势。季变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了寧瑠。另一方面，原本都很顺利的遊戲開發部遇见了莉音的强大兵器前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C强大的夹攻成功让时处于劣势。时变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了尼禄。另一方面，原本都很顺利的游戏开发部遇见了莉央的强大兵器前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C强大的夹攻成功让季处于劣势。季变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了宁瑠。另一方面，原本都很顺利的游戏开发部遇见了莉音的强大兵器前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C强大的夹攻成功让时处于劣势。时变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了妮露。另一方面，原本都很顺利的游戏开发部遇见了莉央的强大兵器前卫君。

desc.en: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.thai: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.ko: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_tw: 在C&C和季对峙的时候，莉音早已察觉到老师和遊戲開發部前来拯救愛麗絲，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止遊戲開發部一行人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在C&C和时对峙的时候，莉央早已察觉到老师和游戏开发部前来拯救爱丽丝，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止游戏开发部一行人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在C&C和季对峙的时候，莉音早已察觉到老师和游戏开发部前来拯救爱丽丝，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止游戏开发部一行人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在C&C和时对峙的时候，莉央早已察觉到老师和游戏开发部前来拯救爱丽丝，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止游戏开发部一行人。

desc.en: C&C and Toki were on a par with each other. Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she isolated the other members and made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.jp: C&C and Toki were on a par with each other. Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she isolated the other members and made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.thai: C&C and Toki were on a par with each other. Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she isolated the other members and made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.ko: C&C and Toki were on a par with each other. Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she isolated the other members and made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.zh_tw: C&C与季打的有来有回。季领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将寧瑠与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C与时打的有来有回。时领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将尼禄与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C与季打的有来有回。季领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将宁瑠与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C与时打的有来有回。时领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将妮露与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。

desc.en: The communication with Veritas was cut off all at once, and everyone was greeted by Rio. Rio wasn't surprised by the current situation, and mentioned the "Trolley Problem" with Sensei - which repeated her theory of "sacrificing little in exchange of the lives of the most". Momoi cut it off and made her position clear and loud. Seeing no turning back, Rio put Avant Guard into use.

desc.zh_tw: 与貝里塔斯的通讯突然中断，取而代之的是莉音的问候。莉音对形势并不感到惊讶，并向老师提出了“电车难题”——同样是在重复一开始“以少数者的伤亡换大多数的生存”的理论。桃井打断了对话，阐明自己只想把愛麗絲带回来。莉音见对话再无挽回，启用了前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 与真理社的通讯突然中断，取而代之的是莉央的问候。莉央对形势并不感到惊讶，并向老师提出了“电车难题”——同样是在重复一开始“以少数者的伤亡换大多数的生存”的理论。桃井打断了对话，阐明自己只想把爱丽丝带回来。莉央见对话再无挽回，启用了前卫君。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 与真理会的通讯突然中断，取而代之的是莉央的问候。莉央对形势并不感到惊讶，并向老师提出了“电车难题”——同样是在重复一开始“以少数者的伤亡换大多数的生存”的理论。桃打断了对话，阐明自己只想把爱丽丝带回来。莉央见对话再无挽回，启用了前卫君。

desc.en: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.jp: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.thai: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.ko: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.zh_tw: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在朱音的建议下，老师和寧瑠找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但季似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让寧瑠受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在茜的建议下，老师和尼禄找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但时似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让尼禄受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在朱音的建议下，老师和宁瑠找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但季似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让宁瑠受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在茜的建议下，老师和妮露找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但时似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让妮露受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。

desc.en: C&C was unable to inflict any damage to the suit, as Chihiro reported. Chihiro also noticed that it seemed that all the electricity and computing power were all on this suit, making it even be able to predict the future. On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane suddenly pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.

desc.zh_tw: C&C没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，千尋报告了这点。同时千尋还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定未来。听闻此话的遊戲開發部众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时朱音突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，千寻报告了这点。同时千寻还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定未来。听闻此话的游戏开发部众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时茜突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。

desc.en: Sensei realized something all of a sudden, commanding Neru to get to the rooftop. Rio said it was useless to do so, but Sensei didn't respond. Toki fired at Neru and blew up the rooftop, as the two falling down from the top.

desc.zh_tw: 老师突然意识到了什么，命令寧瑠将战场转移到房顶上。莉音表示转移到楼顶同样没有，但老师笑而不语。季向寧瑠开炮，炸掉了房顶，两人从空中摔落。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Sensei finally revealed the true intent: if it was designed to battle on the ground, then how about falling from the sky? The fact proved it right. Though only in a flash, Yuzu had already spotted its weakness.

desc.zh_tw: 老师的意图此时终于表现出来：既然是为地面作战设计，在空中又怎么样呢？事实证明的确如此。虽然只有一瞬间的时间，但柚子已经完全注意到了其弱点所在。

desc.en: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
